name: Fresh Tuna Ceviche
author: POOPY SHOES
summary: Ceviche made with fresh, raw tuna chunks.  Great as an appetizer or side dish.  I learned this one from my grandparents and found it to be a winner among my college buddies.
ingredients: ¾ bunch green onions, thinly sliced
1  fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
¼ cup lemon juice, or to taste
¼ teaspoon soy sauce, or to taste
directions: Cut tuna into 1/2 inch cubes, and place into a bowl
Stir in the onion, green onions, ginger, jalapeno, lemon juice, and soy sauce; mix to combine
Cover and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours
Taste before serving and add more lemon juice or soy sauce as needed
